skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Flurry of Arrows
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 1 turn. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Heal Reduction] debuff.
skills.name: Art of Pain
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 100%. Has an extra 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Damage increases according to enemy MAX HP.
skills.name: Heartseeker
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
